inclusion.criterion: Functional Mitral regurgitation by 2D echocardiography using an integrative method
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is scheduled for cardiac surgery (e.g. CABG including patients on the waiting list for Heart Transplantation)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is 22 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient is willing and able to sign Informed Consent Form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Within 90 days patients should be on stable optimally uptitrated medical therapy recommended according to current guidelines23 as standard of care for heart failure therapy in the United States
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any evidence of structural (chordal or leaflet) mitral valve disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to derive ERO, LVESVI or LVEDVI by TTE
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior surgical or percutaneous mitral valve intervention
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with chronic intravenous inotropic therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe, irreversible pulmonary hypertension in the judgement of the investigator
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation. She remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
